message.body: oh boy hows this gonna go. If this is really gonna be the case, how are you guys gonna take precautions?
isnt the privatekey something we own ourselves? Not something we publish?
well good news is on the way. One of my old friends from high school is doing research on QKD, so fun times ahead
hehe. QKD stands for quantum key distribution. Basically, it makes it super easy to figure out if someone apart from the end users are messing with keys
@basxto it should probably be good practice to put zn on a VM then. I think maybe a blog post for best practices on zn should be made at some point
AppArmor? First time i've heard of this. What does it do?
Ah well that's convenient
interesting. i will get this installed and configured in the next few days
I am a bit worried though. For some reason im getting some weird inject.js error on the home page
Also I normally tunnel by ssh to connect to the machine that seeds zn pages for me, but I'm getting a connection refused. Know what's going on there?
landing page when typing localhost:43110
i'm using both. I can still access zn through local, but not when I ssh tunnel to zn
i haven't had this issue till recently
@erkan alright writing a bug report. Also gimme a second
@erkan did you accidentally publish? cause I can't find the link you sent charles about the whisper app
@erkan oh woops that might have been a different chat. damn this gets confusing
doesn't manual update take care of that?
@erkan i take it back. you did link charles a wiki page at some point but that message is gone
@erkan oh ffs! I can access ZN through IE with what I have
(ew IE)
opera. I took a closer look at the logs and there was an error about extensions
(It was a moment of weakness, I'll never use an MS product again)
/me prostates himself
Alright I think i was able to reproduce the cause. Whenever I enable Opera Turbo is when problems start to appear
@basxto meant as an apology
/me wiggles
uhh
cx alright thats enough fun times for me. Glad that whole browser issue is identified, now I can sleep easier.
thanks @erkan. Was fun talkin to you guys
